00066             {

00068                   {
00069                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00070                         $this->DatabaseAlgorithms = get_package( 'database::database_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00071                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00072                         $this->UserAccess = get_package( 'user::user_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00073                   }
00074                   catch( Exception $e )
00075                   {
00076                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00077                   }
00078             }

00110             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00111             {
00112                   try
00113                   {
00114                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00115                         {
00116                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00117                         }
00118                         else
00119                         {
00120                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00121                         }
00122                   }
00123                   catch( Exception $e )
00124                   {
00125                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00126                   }
00127             }

00171             function                select( $Start = false , $Limit = false , $Field = false , $Order = false , 
00172                                                                                                                   $Condition = '1 = 1' , $Options = false )
00173             {
00174                   try
00175                   {
00176                         $AddCondition = '';
00177                         if( $Options !== false && $Options->get_setting( 'category_name' , false ) )
00178                         {     
00179                               $Category = get_package( 'category::category_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00180                               $AddCondition = 'AND category IN ( '.implode( 
00181                                     ',' , $Category->get_category_ids( $Options->get_setting( 'category_name' ) ) 
00182                               ).' )';
00183                         }
00184                         
00185                         $Condition = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->select_condition( 
00186                               $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order , $Condition
00187                         );
00188                         
00189                         return( $this->unsafe_select( $Condition ) );
00190                   }
00191                   catch( Exception $e )
00192                   {
00193                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00194                   }
00195             }
00196             
00215             function                unsafe_select( $Condition = ' 1 = 1 ' )
00216             {
00217                   try
00218                   {
00219                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00220                         
00221                         $Content = $this->Database->select( 
00222                               $this->NativeTable.'.* , umx_category.title AS category_title , user.login AS author_name' , 
00223                               $this->NativeTable.' , umx_category , '.$this->UserAccess->NativeTable.' AS user' , 
00224                               "author = user.id AND ( $this->AddLimitations ) AND umx_category.id = category AND $Condition"
00225                         );
00226                         
00227                         foreach( $Content as $k => $v )
00228                         {
00229                               $DemoContent = $this->Security->get( get_field( $v , 'demo_content' ) , 'unsafe_string' );
00230                               set_field( $Content[ $k ] , 'demo_content_unsafe' , $DemoContent );
00231                               
00232                               $MainContent = $this->Security->get( get_field( $v , 'main_content' ) , 'unsafe_string' );
00233                               set_field( $Content[ $k ] , 'main_content_unsafe' , $MainContent );
00234                         }
00235                         
00236                         return( $Content );
00237                   }
00238                   catch( Exception $e )
00239                   {
00240                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00241                   }
00242             }

00334             function                create( $Record )
00335             {
00336                   try
00337                   {
00338                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00339                               $Record , 
00340                               'author:integer;title:string;category:integer;demo_content:string;'.
00341                                     'main_content:string;keywords:string;description:string'
00342                         );
00343                         
00344                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( 
00345                               $Record , CREATION_DATE | PUBLICATION_DATE | MODIFICATION_DATE
00346                         );
00347 
00348                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00349                         
00350                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00351                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_content' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00352                         
00353                         return( $id );
00354                   }
00355                   catch( Exception $e )
00356                   {
00357                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00358                   }
00359             }

00423             function                get_publication_structure( $CategoryIds )
00424             {
00425                   try
00426                   {
00427                         $CategoryIds = $this->Security->get( $CategoryIds , 'integer' );
00428                         
00429                         return( 
00430                               $this->Database->select( 
00431                                     'YEAR( publication_date ) AS publication_year , MONTH( publication_date ) AS publication_month'.
00432                                           ' , COUNT( * ) AS publication_count' , 
00433                                     $this->NativeTable , 
00434                                     'category IN ( '.implode( ',' , $CategoryIds ).
00435                                           ' ) GROUP BY publication_year , publication_month ORDER BY publication_date ASC'
00436                               )
00437                         );
00438                   }
00439                   catch( Exception $e )
00440                   {
00441                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00475             function                get_content_for_date( $Year , $Month , $CategoryIds )
00476             {
00477                   try
00478                   {
00479                         $Year = $this->Security->get( $Year , 'integer' );
00480                         $Month = $this->Security->get( $Month , 'integer' );
00481                         $CategoryIds = $this->Security->get( $CategoryIds , 'integer' );
00482                         
00483                         return( 
00484                               $this->unsafe_select( 
00485                                     "YEAR( publication_date ) = $Year AND MONTH( publication_date ) = $Month AND ".
00486                                           'category IN ( '.implode( ',' , $CategoryIds ).' ) ORDER BY publication_date ASC'
00487                               )
00488                         );
00489                   }

00518             function                update( $id , $Record )
00519             {
00520                   try
00521                   {
00522                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00523                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00524                               $Record , 
00525                               'author:integer;title:string;category:integer;demo_content:string;main_content:string;'.
00526                                     'keywords:string;description:string' , 'allow_not_set'
00527                         );
00528                         
00529                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00530                         
00531                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00532                         {
00533                               /* the modification_date will be changed only if the content was changed */ 
00534                               $Fields [] = 'modification_date';
00535                               $Values [] = 'now()';
00536                               
00537                               $this->Database->update( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )" );
00538                               $this->Database->commit();
00539                         }
00540                   }
00541                   catch( Exception $e )
00542                   {
00543                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00544                   }
00545             }
00546             
00573             function                search( $Start , $SearchString )
00574             {
00575                   try
00576                   {
00577                         $Start = $this->Security->get( $Start , 'integer' );
00578                         $SearchString = $this->Security->get( $SearchString , 'string' );
00579                         
00580                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00581                         
00582                         $Records = $this->Database->select( 
00583                               "id , CONCAT( title , ' ' , demo_content , ' ' , main_content ) AS record_text , ".
00584                               "CHAR_LENGTH( CONCAT( title , ' ' , demo_content , ' ' , main_content ) ) - CHAR_LENGTH( 
00585                                     REPLACE( CONCAT( title , ' ' , demo_content , ' ' , main_content ) , '$SearchString' , '' ) 
00586                               ) AS relevation , 
00587                               CONCAT( './content_view.html?content_id=' , id ) AS source_page , 
00588                               title AS source_page_title" , 
00589                               $this->NativeTable , 
00590                               "( $this->AddLimitations ) ORDER BY relevation DESC LIMIT $Start , 10"
00591                         );
00592                         
00593                         return( $Records );
00594                   }
00595                   catch( Exception $e )
00596                   {
00597                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00598                   }
00599             }
